StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [spChangeStatus]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@error_id int, @status varchar(20)
as
if @status = 'RESOLVED' begin update error_log set STATUS = @status, REPROCESS = 'N' where ERROR_LOG_ID = @error_id end else
if @status = 'OBE' begin update error_log set STATUS = @status, REPROCESS = 'N' where ERROR_LOG_ID = @error_id end else
if @status = 'UNRESOLVED' begin update error_log set STATUS = @status where ERROR_LOG_ID = @error_id end else begin print 'The status value you entered is incorrect.' print 'You may only enter RESOLVED, UNRESOLVED, or OBE.' print 'Please try again.' end
